programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 7555294, Title: L.A.'s Finest, --- Description: L.A.'s Finest: Created by Brandon Margolis, Brandon Sonnier. With Jessica Alba, Gabrielle Union, Duane Martin, Zach Gilford. The spinoff series of Bad Boys films focuses on drug enforcement agent Sydney Burnett, now working for the Los Angeles Police Department." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7555294/","name":"L.A.'s Finest","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjVlMzZkMTYtYjFiYy00Njc4LTk2NmMtYmRhZjJmZjcxNDg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The spinoff series of Bad Boys films focuses on drug enforcement agent Sydney Burnett, now working for the Los Angeles Police Department.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7555294/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"rhinestonelife","dateCreated":"2019-07-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pleasantly surprised","reviewBody":"The advertising for this was kind of lame - featured some of the schmaltzier moments sandwiched in between those "spectrum originals" voice over bumpers that sound like, well, bad cable ads. I ended up trying one episode because I like the stars - and that led to two more and then over a couple weeks watched all season 1. High caliber actresses, fun supporting cast, interesting enough story, splashy action, some silly dialogue, overly fast resolutions and hacky flashbacks but overall a solid seven of an extended action flick. Shades of lethal weapon, a little too parallel to bad boys (rich cop / family cop) but I appreciated the longer arc of character development and connection between the two leads they could do with multiple episodes as compared to a 2 hour movie. Looked up renewal and see a second season coming. I will watch it!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6388,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2019-05-13","keywords":"location in series title,female police officer,female police detective,buddy cop,police partner police partner relationship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004695/","name":"Jessica Alba","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005517/","name":"Gabrielle Union","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0552222/","name":"Duane Martin"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102770/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0746691/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0354076/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2474120/","name":"Brandon Margolis","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1228961/","name":"Brandon Sonnier"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi100121881","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTcwMDdiNGEtNmM5Mi00NDgwLThmMDAtN2VkYmU1YzAzZjY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTcwMDdiNGEtNmM5Mi00NDgwLThmMDAtN2VkYmU1YzAzZjY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent="

High caliber actresses, fun supporting cast, interesting enough story, splashy action, some silly dialogue, overly fast resolutions and hacky flashbacks but overall a solid seven of an extended action flick. Shades of lethal weapon, a little too parallel to bad boys (rich cop / family cop) but I appreciated the longer arc of character development and connection between the two leads they could do with multiple episodes as compared to a 2 hour movie. Looked up renewal and see a second season coming. The spinoff series of Bad Boys films focuses on drug enforcement agent Sydney Burnett, now working for the Los Angeles Police Department." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7555294/","name":"L.A.'s Finest","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjVlMzZkMTYtYjFiYy00Njc4LTk2NmMtYmRhZjJmZjcxNDg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The spinoff series of Bad Boys films focuses on drug enforcement agent Sydney Burnett, now working for the Los Angeles Police Department.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7555294/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"rhinestonelife","dateCreated":"2019-07-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pleasantly surprised","reviewBody":"The advertising for this was kind of lame - featured some of the schmaltzier moments sandwiched in between those "spectrum originals" voice over bumpers that sound like, well, bad cable ads. I ended up trying one episode because I like the stars - and that led to two more and then over a couple weeks watched all season 1. High caliber actresses, fun supporting cast, interesting enough story, splashy action, some silly dialogue, overly fast resolutions and hacky flashbacks but overall a solid seven of an extended action flick. Shades of lethal weapon, a little too parallel to bad boys (rich cop / family cop) but I appreciated the longer arc of character development and connection between the two leads they could do with multiple episodes as compared to a 2 hour movie. Looked up renewal and see a second season coming. I will watch it!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6388,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2019-05-13","keywords":"location in series title,female police officer,female police detective,buddy cop,police partner police partner relationship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004695/","name":"Jessica Alba","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005517/","name":"Gabrielle Union","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0552222/","name":"Duane Martin"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102770/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0746691/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0354076/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2474120/","name":"Brandon Margolis","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1228961/","name":"Brandon Sonnier"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi100121881","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTcwMDdiNGEtNmM5Mi00NDgwLThmMDAtN2VkYmU1YzAzZjY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTcwMDdiNGEtNmM5Mi00NDgwLThmMDAtN2VkYmU1YzAzZjY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 2147995, Title: Der Tatortreiniger, --- Description: Der Tatortreiniger: With Bjarne Mädel, Peer Martiny, Jörg Pose, Jule Böwe. The bizarre everyday adventures of Heiko "Schotty" Schotte, whose profession is to clean up crime scenes." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2147995/","name":"Der Tatortreiniger","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTBmZGJkMzMtMzMwOC00ZDRmLWIxY2UtNzJhOTdjNTFkNTk1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAwMzM3NDI3._V1_.jpg","description":"The bizarre everyday adventures of Heiko "Schotty" Schotte, whose profession is to clean up crime scenes.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2147995/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"massa-2","dateCreated":"2015-01-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Consistently brilliant and hilarious","reviewBody":"I'll just endorse Laura's excellent review above and keep this very short.

Der Tatortreiniger is outstanding -- a seriously funny series with plots that are a wonderful combination of the surreal and the mundane and writing that is breathtakingly clever. Bjarne Madel and the guest actors in each episode deliver the rapid-fire lines with perfect throw-away understatement.

It's rare to find myself laughing out loud almost all the way through any show, let alone each one in a series. What a treat! Thank you MHz indeed. Can't wait for the DVD release.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6589,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.5,"genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2011-12-23","keywords":"blood stain,homicide,dead man,murder,police","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1553080/","name":"Bjarne Mädel","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0554208/","name":"Peer Martiny","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0692630/","name":"Jörg Pose"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0390645/"]</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0408381, Title: Doc Martin, --- Description: Doc Martin: Created by Dominic Minghella, Mark Crowdy, Craig Ferguson. With Martin Clunes, Caroline Catz, Ian McNeice, Joe Absolom. The trials and tribulations of Dr. Martin Ellingham (Martin Clunes), a socially challenged doctor who moves from London to the picturesque village of Port Wenn in Cornwall." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0408381/","name":"Doc Martin","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWNmMTAxZTAtNzNhZS00MThhLWJmMmEtYWExZGUzODkxMmM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjExMjk0ODk@._V1_.jpg","description":"The trials and tribulations of Dr. Martin Ellingham (Martin Clunes), a socially challenged doctor who moves from London to the picturesque village of Port Wenn in Cornwall.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0408381/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"pertinaciousbreath","dateCreated":"2009-08-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"This American Says Keep it British!!!","reviewBody":"Doc Martin is as close as it gets to perfection. Martin Clunes and Dominic Minghella should (and I'm sure do) take intense pride over their creation. The writing is the best in the business, the director Ben Bolt is amazing, and the acting is subtle, natural, hilarious and touching. In addition to Martin Clunes, Caroline Catz has shown herself to be one of the best of her generation. And the scenery and music, of course, are beautiful.\n\nPleeeeeeaaaaaaaase, please, please Mr. and Mrs. Clunes: Don't sell out to us Yanks. Let the American version of Men Behaving Badly be your guide...Don't do it, ever, under any circumstances!","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":14096,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2004-09-02","keywords":"socially awkward man,doctor,opposites attract,fear of blood,rural setting","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0167340/","name":"Martin Clunes","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0146414/","name":"Caroline Catz","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0573862/","name":"Ian McNeice"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103911/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0136637/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0591286/","name":"Dominic Minghella","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0189596/","name":"Mark Crowdy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0272401/","name":"Craig Ferguson"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Doc Martin: Series 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2606414105","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWU0NDQ5NTctYjJmOC00MmRjLWEwYzItYjNjYzllNTY2YWI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWU0NDQ5NTctYjJmOC00MmRjLWEwYzItYjNjYzllNTY2YWI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Doc Martin: Season 8"</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0083437, Title: Knight Rider, --- Description: Knight Rider: Created by Glen A. Larson. With David Hasselhoff, Edward Mulhare, Richard Basehart, Patricia McPherson. A lone crimefighter battles the forces of evil with the help of a virtually indestructible and artificially intelligent supercar." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0083437/","name":"Knight Rider","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjVjMmY2ZTctZWNjMS00MzQ1LTgzZjItN2ZmNzMwMmUxNDlkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjExODE1MDc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A lone crimefighter battles the forces of evil with the help of a virtually indestructible and artificially intelligent supercar.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0083437/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"hubbaork","dateCreated":"2005-11-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's make just make believe","reviewBody":"I was 3 years old when Knight Rider was released in 1982, I remember vaguely seeing some of the episodes when they were new. I find it puzzling that people will "nit-pic" a TV show that lasted a decent 4 years on the air, yes maybe corny to todays standards, but the show was harmless entertainment. Unlike TV programming today, at least it had it's own originality. Kids could watch it without a lot of heavy violence or nudity, (which was like none in Knight Rider. to name only a few.) on the contrary, it was very much sci-fi, as well as drama, and action. Bottom line, it's a TV show, get real folks, does anyone have imagination anymore?","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":31903,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9,"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"1982-09-26","keywords":"vehicle driving by itself,private detective,crime fighter,pontiac trans am,1980s","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001327/","name":"David Hasselhoff","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0611811/","name":"Edward Mulhare","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000865/","name":"Richard Basehart"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0088140/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0488991/","name":"Glen A. programme.desc: ER: Created by Michael Crichton. With Noah Wyle, Laura Innes, Laura Cerón, Deezer D. The lives, loves and losses of the doctors and nurses of Chicago's County General Hospital." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0108757/","name":"ER","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWQ0YTQ1ZmQtNzk1NC00NzMzLWJjNDYtMDQ0MTcxMThhYTI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives, loves and losses of the doctors and nurses of Chicago's County General Hospital.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0108757/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"julia_rakowski"},"dateCreated":"2004-03-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"The life and times of doctors at Cook County General Hospital, Chicago.","reviewBody":"The best medical drama ever to be aired! It's fast paced, emotional, and suspenseful. The cast is unbeatable. Composed of some of the best actors and actresses Hollywood has ever seen including George Clooney. The show is extremely realistic down to the smallest detail, yet easy enough to understand. There is a lot of drama, but also some comic relief. The characters are all unique and different, but they work well together on stage. The plots and sub-plots are very diversified, but they all tie in somehow. The writing and coordination is incredible. I would recommend this show to everyone, it sure is a change from the warm fuzzies of television!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":54644,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"1994-09-19","keywords":"emergency room,sleeping,medical care,medical doctor,ensemble cast","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000381/","name":"Anthony Edwards"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000123/","name":"George Clooney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000523/","name":"Julianna Margulies"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093758/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0037310/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009119/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000341/","name":"Michael Crichton"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Er: Season 15","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2463087897","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDg1YmVhZjEtZmFlMC00NGNiLWIyODgtNjBjNTc2ZTZmNjE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDg1YmVhZjEtZmFlMC00NGNiLWIyODgtNjBjNTc2ZTZmNjE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Er: Season 15"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: 1-800-Missing
Missing: Disparus sans laisser de traces
programme.desc:
1-800-Missing: Created by Glenn Davis, William Laurin. With Caterina Scorsone, Vivica A. Fox, Mark Consuelos, Louis Ferreira. Two FBI agents - one guided by reason, and another by intuition - looking for missing people in Washington, D.C." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0373474/","name":"1-800-Missing","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNThjNjBiMmQtNTRlMi00YWEyLWJjMmUtOThkYjcxNDNjMTY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE1MTYxMzk2._V1_.jpg","description":"Two FBI agents - one guided by reason, and another by intuition - looking for missing people in Washington, D.C.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0373474/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"marisawenzel"},"dateCreated":"2006-03-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Retooling and re-casting ruined the show","reviewBody":"1-800-Missing was an imperfect but enjoyable show.

Sadly, in a counter-productive attempt at helping the show, Lifetime ruined it.

They ruined the look of the show by shooting it on video, giving it a barely-professional look and most importantly, they cast Vivica Fox.

Vivica Fox ruins every scene she is in on that show. She is devoid of any discernible acting ability and grimaces her way through scenes.

It's hard to imagine why they let an excellent actress like Gloria Reuben go, but to replace her with a bad actress like Ms. Fox shows that the show has now reached its creative death.

Maybe it is now so cheap to do (it does look like amateur hour at the local theater!) that they are still shooting it, but really... is there anyone still watching it?"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1302,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2003-08-02","keywords":"fbi federal bureau of investigation,female protagonist,scene before opening credits,law enforcement,vision","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0778741/","name":"Caterina Scorsone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000407/","name":"Vivica A. Fox"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176175/","name":"Mark Consuelos"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0070328/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0188462/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0147955/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0204657/","name":"Glenn Davis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0491462/","name":"William Laurin"}]}</script><metacontent="

Sadly, in a counter-productive attempt at helping the show, Lifetime ruined it.

They ruined the look of the show by shooting it on video, giving it a barely-professional look and most importantly, they cast Vivica Fox.

Vivica Fox ruins every scene she is in on that show. She is devoid of any discernible acting ability and grimaces her way through scenes.

It's hard to imagine why they let an excellent actress like Gloria Reuben go, but to replace her with a bad actress like Ms. Fox shows that the show has now reached its creative death.

Two FBI agents - one guided by reason, and another by intuition - looking for missing people in Washington, D.C." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0373474/","name":"1-800-Missing","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNThjNjBiMmQtNTRlMi00YWEyLWJjMmUtOThkYjcxNDNjMTY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE1MTYxMzk2._V1_.jpg","description":"Two FBI agents - one guided by reason, and another by intuition - looking for missing people in Washington, D.C.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0373474/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"marisawenzel"},"dateCreated":"2006-03-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Retooling and re-casting ruined the show","reviewBody":"1-800-Missing was an imperfect but enjoyable show.

Sadly, in a counter-productive attempt at helping the show, Lifetime ruined it.

They ruined the look of the show by shooting it on video, giving it a barely-professional look and most importantly, they cast Vivica Fox.

Vivica Fox ruins every scene she is in on that show. She is devoid of any discernible acting ability and grimaces her way through scenes.

It's hard to imagine why they let an excellent actress like Gloria Reuben go, but to replace her with a bad actress like Ms. Fox shows that the show has now reached its creative death.

Maybe it is now so cheap to do (it does look like amateur hour at the local theater!) that they are still shooting it, but really... is there anyone still watching it?"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1302,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2003-08-02","keywords":"fbi federal bureau of investigation,female protagonist,scene before opening credits,law enforcement,vision","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0778741/","name":"Caterina Scorsone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000407/","name":"Vivica A. programme.title: Mariage à l'anglaise
programme.desc: Depuis qu’ils se sont rencontrés dans une soirée, Nat, jeune femme ambitieuse, et Josh, apprenti romancier, nagent dans le bonheur, malgré leurs différences. Car si Josh est plutôt du genre intellectuel, Nat est une fonceuse. Ce qui ne les a pas empêchés d’être réunis par un coup de foudre réciproque. Leur mariage est idyllique, même si personne de leurs proches à leurs amis, jusqu’au pasteur qui officie, ne croit qu’il pourra durer… Surtout quand l’ex-petite amie de Josh, Chloe, et le charmant client américain de Nat, Guy, s’en mêlent….

programme.title: Comment tuer son boss ?
programme.desc: Nick Hendricks est le souffre-douleur attitré de son patron, qui le fait travailler plus de douze heures par jour et lui donne des dossiers le week-end. Dale Arbus, assistant dentaire, subit les assauts de sa patronne nymphomane, qui se plaît à le mettre dans des situations embarrassantes. Kurt Buckman, qui était heureux au travail, est désespéré depuis que le fils de son ancien patron, accro à la cocaïne, a repris les rênes de l'entreprise. Ensemble, les trois amis décident d'embaucher un tueur afin de supprimer leurs patrons respectifs.

programme.desc: ER: Created by Michael Crichton. With Noah Wyle, Laura Innes, Laura Cerón, Deezer D. The lives, loves and losses of the doctors and nurses of Chicago's County General Hospital." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0108757/","name":"ER","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWQ0YTQ1ZmQtNzk1NC00NzMzLWJjNDYtMDQ0MTcxMThhYTI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives, loves and losses of the doctors and nurses of Chicago's County General Hospital.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0108757/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"julia_rakowski"},"dateCreated":"2004-03-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"The life and times of doctors at Cook County General Hospital, Chicago.","reviewBody":"The best medical drama ever to be aired! It's fast paced, emotional, and suspenseful. The cast is unbeatable. Composed of some of the best actors and actresses Hollywood has ever seen including George Clooney. The show is extremely realistic down to the smallest detail, yet easy enough to understand. There is a lot of drama, but also some comic relief. The characters are all unique and different, but they work well together on stage. The plots and sub-plots are very diversified, but they all tie in somehow. The writing and coordination is incredible. I would recommend this show to everyone, it sure is a change from the warm fuzzies of television!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":54644,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"1994-09-19","keywords":"emergency room,sleeping,medical care,medical doctor,ensemble cast","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000381/","name":"Anthony Edwards"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000123/","name":"George Clooney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000523/","name":"Julianna Margulies"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093758/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0037310/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009119/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000341/","name":"Michael Crichton"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Er: Season 15","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2463087897","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDg1YmVhZjEtZmFlMC00NGNiLWIyODgtNjBjNTc2ZTZmNjE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDg1YmVhZjEtZmFlMC00NGNiLWIyODgtNjBjNTc2ZTZmNjE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Er: Season 15"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: 1-800-Missing
Missing: Disparus sans laisser de traces
programme.desc:
1-800-Missing: Created by Glenn Davis, William Laurin. With Caterina Scorsone, Vivica A. Fox, Mark Consuelos, Louis Ferreira. Two FBI agents - one guided by reason, and another by intuition - looking for missing people in Washington, D.C." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0373474/","name":"1-800-Missing","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNThjNjBiMmQtNTRlMi00YWEyLWJjMmUtOThkYjcxNDNjMTY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE1MTYxMzk2._V1_.jpg","description":"Two FBI agents - one guided by reason, and another by intuition - looking for missing people in Washington, D.C.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0373474/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"marisawenzel"},"dateCreated":"2006-03-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Retooling and re-casting ruined the show","reviewBody":"1-800-Missing was an imperfect but enjoyable show.

Sadly, in a counter-productive attempt at helping the show, Lifetime ruined it.

They ruined the look of the show by shooting it on video, giving it a barely-professional look and most importantly, they cast Vivica Fox.

Vivica Fox ruins every scene she is in on that show. She is devoid of any discernible acting ability and grimaces her way through scenes.

It's hard to imagine why they let an excellent actress like Gloria Reuben go, but to replace her with a bad actress like Ms. Fox shows that the show has now reached its creative death.

Maybe it is now so cheap to do (it does look like amateur hour at the local theater!) that they are still shooting it, but really... is there anyone still watching it?"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1302,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2003-08-02","keywords":"fbi federal bureau of investigation,female protagonist,scene before opening credits,law enforcement,vision","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0778741/","name":"Caterina Scorsone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000407/","name":"Vivica A. Fox"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176175/","name":"Mark Consuelos"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0070328/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0188462/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0147955/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0204657/","name":"Glenn Davis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0491462/","name":"William Laurin"}]}</script><metacontent="

Sadly, in a counter-productive attempt at helping the show, Lifetime ruined it.

They ruined the look of the show by shooting it on video, giving it a barely-professional look and most importantly, they cast Vivica Fox.

Vivica Fox ruins every scene she is in on that show. She is devoid of any discernible acting ability and grimaces her way through scenes.

It's hard to imagine why they let an excellent actress like Gloria Reuben go, but to replace her with a bad actress like Ms. Fox shows that the show has now reached its creative death.

Sadly, in a counter-productive attempt at helping the show, Lifetime ruined it.

They ruined the look of the show by shooting it on video, giving it a barely-professional look and most importantly, they cast Vivica Fox.

Vivica Fox ruins every scene she is in on that show. She is devoid of any discernible acting ability and grimaces her way through scenes.

It's hard to imagine why they let an excellent actress like Gloria Reuben go, but to replace her with a bad actress like Ms. Fox shows that the show has now reached its creative death.
